title: Replace uploadable photo gallery with static Ghibli-style storybook slider

requirements.summary: Remove the photo upload UI and related upload logic from the Photos section.
acceptanceCriteria: The upload card/CTA ("Add More Photos") is no longer rendered in the Photos section UI.
The hidden <input type="file"> and related upload handler logic are removed or unused.
The Photos section no longer imports or renders the Upload icon from lucide-react.

file_operations.description: Remove the upload card/CTA, hidden file input, and FileReader-based upload handler; remove lucide-react Upload import; ensure empty-state copy no longer suggests uploading. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update the preloaded gallery to use exactly 6 new generated Ghibli-style couple images and ensure the slider uses them.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/preloadedPhotos.ts is updated to reference exactly 6 image paths under /assets/generated/ for the new Ghibli-style images.
The Photos section initializes its gallery from the updated preloaded photo list and shows the 6 images in the slider with navigation/thumbnails.
No references to the existing WhatsApp preloaded JPEG filenames remain in preloadedPhotos.ts.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing WhatsApp JPEG paths with exactly 6 absolute paths pointing to the generated assets: /assets/generated/ghibli-couple-study-laptop.dim_1920x1080.png, /assets/generated/ghibli-couple-biscuits-tea.dim_1920x1080.png, /assets/generated/ghibli-couple-gym-workout.dim_1920x1080.png, /assets/generated/ghibli-couple-dance-joy.dim_1920x1080.png, /assets/generated/ghibli-couple-bike-together.dim_1920x1080.png, /assets/generated/ghibli-couple-heart-within.dim_1920x1080.png. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the gallery/slider state is derived from the updated preloadedPhotos list (keeping fallback image behavior) and that navigation + thumbnails correctly cover all 6 images. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply an English, storybook-themed 'Ghibli storybook birthday surprise' presentation to the Photos section heading and framing without changing app structure.
acceptanceCriteria: The Photos section heading in frontend/src/App.tsx is updated to an English, storybook-themed title (not "Our Memories Together").
The Photos section includes light storybook-like framing (e.g., caption/chapter feel, gentle decorative styling) without introducing new data entry or upload features.
All new/updated user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Update the Photos section heading text to an English storybook-themed title consistent with a 'Ghibli storybook birthday surprise' (keeping the existing hero → messages → photos structure unchanged). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add storybook-like framing around the slider (e.g., chapter-style intro/subtitle and per-slide English captions aligned to the six scenes) while keeping the gallery read-only and removing any data-entry affordances. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add minimal global styling utilities (via existing Tailwind layers) to support a subtle storybook frame/caption feel used by PhotosSection (no new stylesheet files). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add the 6 generated images as static frontend assets under frontend/public and reference them directly via /assets/generated paths.
acceptanceCriteria: All 6 new images exist as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with the exact filenames specified in the image requirements.
The app references the images via absolute paths like /assets/generated/<filename>.png.
No backend code is added/required to fetch or serve these images.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static image asset to the frontend public folder (study together with a laptop).
Add the generated static image asset to the frontend public folder (sharing biscuits and tea).
Add the generated static image asset to the frontend public folder (gym workout together).
Add the generated static image asset to the frontend public folder (dancing joyfully).
Add the generated static image asset to the frontend public folder (riding a bicycle together).
Add the generated static image asset to the frontend public folder (heart within us motif).
